query: Research the best programming framework for building AI applications and provide a comprehensive recommendation
planning_rationale: This task requires both simple data gathering and complex analysis with multiple perspectives. I'll use single agents for data collection and a team for the final analysis and recommendation.
expected_final_output: A comprehensive recommendation for the best programming framework for AI applications

search_ai_frameworks.task_description: Search for popular AI/ML programming frameworks and libraries

search_performance_benchmarks.task_description: Find performance benchmarks and comparisons of AI frameworks

team_analysis_recommendation.task_description: Analyze framework data from multiple perspectives and create a comprehensive recommendation

agents.description: Evaluate technical aspects like performance, scalability, and ease of use
Assess community support, documentation, and ecosystem maturity
Synthesize different perspectives into a final recommendation
